location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham, Council at Bussora (Basra) from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter reports that Shaikh Sadoon had proceeded south with two gallivats to escort dows expected from Muscat after rumours that Shaikh Abdallah of Ormuse [Hormuz] had intended to intercept them. The return of the Bushire Linguist from Shiraz is also reported.
